dcterms:creator: Denis Richer
T. Keo
I. Vania
dcterms:description: A bilingual dictionary providing French-Khmer translations, originally published in Word format and later converted to XML for the MotÀMot project.
dcterms:title: French-Khmer bilingual dictionary of Denis Richer

dcterms:description: A multilingual dictionary that includes French, English, and Malay translations, used to enrich the French entries with pronunciation and parts-of-speech.
dcterms:title: FeM French-English-Malay dictionary

dcterms:creator: L. Romary
S. Salmon-Alt
G. Francopoulo
dcterms:description: A framework that provides standards for the representation of lexical resources, which was utilized in the MotÀMot project for structuring the dictionary entries.
dcterms:title: Lexical Markup Framework (LMF)

dcterms:description: A project aimed at converting a French-Khmer dictionary into a multilingual lexical system, which includes the development of a pivot structure for linking entries.
dcterms:title: MotÀMot project
